page_title: Prepare to Work Safely in the Construction Industry
text: as RSEA Safety Stores. If you will only use PPE on a semi-regular basis, you can go to places such as Bunnings, Officeworks or even Lowes, which carry a range of safety products at a reasonable price. Please note that your CI White Card will not be issued until you have completed your online enrolment. All students will receive a confirmation letter stating that they have successfully completed the Construction Induction White Card Training at RMIT. This can be used to gain access to worksites until the physical card is sent by WorkSafe Victoria.Participants will also be issued with a nationally recognised statement of attainment forCPCCWHS1001 Prepare to work safely in the construction industry. All students will receive a confirmation letter stating that they have successfully completed the Construction Induction White Card Training at RMIT. This can be used to gain access to worksites until the physical card is sent by WorkSafe Victoria. Participants will also be issued with a nationally recognised statement of attainment forCPCCWHS1001 Prepare to work safely in the construction industry.
